comment:
Hay un trabajo de Isaac Ramírez Urra, de la Universidad de Chile, que aborda la etapa post-golpe de Estado. Señala al Golpe de Estado: "El golpe de Estado es el acontecimiento más complejo de Honduras en el siglo XXI, con una lucha de poderes que traspasa las fronteras y que tras de sí, deja una espiral de violencia sin precedentes en la historia de este país centroamericano". 
Es recomendable porque aborda la violencia, la pobreza, antecedentes históricos y aborda también el tema de las cárceles. Dice: "Se requiere de enormes esfuerzos para cambiar la situación en el país, en vista de eso, se darán algunas ideas que pueden servir para frenar en algo la espiral de violencia". 
Recomienda, entre otras cosas, depurar la policía y "Políticas Anti Narcotráfico, para combatir de forma efectiva a la delincuencia y criminalidad relacionada con las drogas".
Aquí el artículo: http://www.revistadivergencia.cl/docs/ediciones/03/08_que_pasa_en_honduras.pdf

comment:
Hi Matt,

in the annual report of the International Breweries ( Netherlands) B.V. on page 3 under General you'll see it says that they belong to the Carlsberg Group. So whoever owns the Group owns them too and the Danish company has 23% directly in the capital of the International Breweries.
This is nothing unusual and you can find the Group's annual report here with more info on the group:
http://www.carlsberggroup.com/investor/downloadcentre/Pages/CarlsbergASAnnualReport2013.aspx

Also, it's probably better to focus on the local breweries and companies if you're after corruption and wrongdoings. I doubt the reports and ownership structures and annual reports of the big holding companies can show anything.

Just let me know if you need anything else ;)

Best,

Lejla

comment:
Hi Lejla,
I've gone back to the beer investigation in Romania, and I wanted to
check back in with you on this point.
In the above exchange I asked you that if CARLSBERG BREWERIES A/S owns
23% of International Breweries Netherlands B.V (which owns Carlsberg
in Romania, known as United Breweries Bereprod), who owns the other
77%?

You said Carlsberg Group owns the remaining 77%, but I'm not sure that's right.

I was never interested in investigating Carlsberg as a global brand,
just the guys that own and run it in Romania. I just got off the phone
with the head media rep for Carlsberg Breweries International and he
said that they DO NOT own Carlsberg in Romania (known as United
Breweries Bereprod via International Breweries Netherlands). It's not
even a subsidiary, just a license market. He would not comment on who
ultimately owns the remaining 77%, but I have a feeling it's these
guys I mentioned in persons of interest in my request to you.

Or maybe I'm just a bit confused.

You have time to check it out?

Matt

comment:
Hi, 

We charge $60 per hour for researcher and any cost of records (depends on country but in very few cases over $50 USD, unless company is owned by other companies which means checking multiple shareholders). We also have Orbis and Lexis which allow us to do general search across number of databases.(that costs $50 for request). 

We can get all available records on any company. In some cases that included waiting for few days to few weeks, but we would not charge you for waiting time.

Best, Miranda

comment:
Hi,

It seems company is registered in one of the offshore jurisdictions. It shouldn't take us more than one day (8 hours) to run searches across databases, individual registers and request information for jurisdictions that don't have online registry. 

Bare in mind not all offshore jurisdictions register directors and shareholders. If that is the case, once we track where it is registered you can work with prosecutors to force registration agent to disclose beneficial owners.

Best, Miranda
author: ah5zfmludmVzdGlnYXRpdmUtZGFzaGJvYXJkLXByb2RyFAsSC1VzZXJQcm9maWxlGPn4mwEM

comment:
Hi, 

We charge $60 per hour for researcher and any cost of records (depends on country but in very few cases over $50 USD, unless company is owned by other companies which means checking multiple shareholders). We also have Orbis and Lexis which allow us to do general search across number of databases.(that costs $50 for request). 

We can get all available records on any company. In some cases that included waiting for few days to few weeks, but we would not charge you for waiting time.

Best, Miranda

comment:
Hi, 

Thanks for filing a request. Before we proceed, I need to ask you if you would be willing to cover the actual costs (if any) of records. Our funding enables us to cover costs of records and research fee for the reporters from media in developing world, but we need to charge big commercial media. We normally charge the actual cost of records (in some cases it is possible to get information for free) and a fee (or credit in a story), but since this would be our first time to work with you, we would be happy to do it for free. 

I did a quick check on Orbis and it looks like it might be an offshore company (I would guess BVI) which means we probably need to first check all the online registers of offshore jurisdictions then file requests with others. 

Best, Miranda
miranda@occrp.org

comment:
No worries. Investigative Dashboard is project of Organized Crime and Corruption Reporting Project. It was established with funds from Open Society and is now also funded by Google. Our partners are ARIJ, ANCIR and Connectas and they have also provided researchers in their region to the project. We have assisted/partnered with hundreds of reporters so far, including SVT on their investigation into TeliaSonera bribery in Uzbekistan.  
Basically we have access to different business databases and have developed expertise in this field. For media who don't have funding we do research for free and cover all costs. In some cases if investigation is very complex and we basically do whole lot of research/reporting we ask for credit. If it is just looking up company we don't. 
On commercial media in the West, we have to ask them to cover actual costs (depends on country, from few dollar to 100 dollars) and a fee for research (or credit if we actually do part of the reporting, which we have done is number of cases). 
All information on ID is confidential and we don't share it with other reporters. 
If you need more info, would be happy to talk to you on Skype.
I have a long flight home from Nepal today but will be available in the evening.
Best, Miranda

comment:
Hello Zoltan,

I have searched for this company and profiles from general databases showed that this company is owned by Lino Luciani. He runs a debt collection services companies in Switzerland and possibly serves as a proxy director for a lot of other companies, at least 40 in Switzerland, a few in Great Britain etc.

The company Rutega AG issued a bearer shares (as you'll see in the Lexis file) therefore it is not possible to say who is the final beneficial owner. 
The company is owned by whoever holds the physical certificate. The company does not register the owner of the shares and it does not track the transfers of ownership.

Aside from that it is also important to note that this company was incorporated in 1967 and it’s not possible to track all the changes that occurred in the company which are only published in the official gazette. We do have archives, but it doesn't go back that far.

I also looked at name Olosz Gergely. Outside of Hungary (where I guess you have better information then I do) I found him as a partial owner of a company Terraprest SRL in Romania.

I also found name Gergely Oroszi (address: Haller Straße 24, 1096 Budapest, Hungary) as director of company Estrellas Privatstiftung (Austria) and company Elias Privatstiftung (Austria), both with many subsidiaries. However, this name variation needs to be confirmed.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic

comment:
Hello Zoltan,

a company which issues bearer shares is owned by whoever holds the physical stock certificate. The issuing firm neither registers the owner of the stock, nor does it track transfers of ownership. The company disperses dividends to bearer shares when a physical coupon is presented to the firm.
Because the share is not registered to any authority, transferring the ownership of the stock involves only delivering the physical document. Bearer shares lack the regulation and control of common shares because ownership is never recorded.

Lejla Camdzic
author: ah5zfmludmVzdGlnYXRpdmUtZGFzaGJvYXJkLXByb2RyGAsSC1VzZXJQcm9maWxlGICAgICAyqAKDA

comment:
I don't think it would be in the any bank's best interest to go public with a company owner. They would loose trust of their corporate clients. If they do have that information, that's only because their clients trust them with it.

But I might be wrong, you can ask for more advice from someone who's had that experience with Swiss banks.

These are not SA companies. Osoul Fund Management SA, for instance, is a Panama-incorporated entity. SA refers to the legal form of  Sociedad Anónima. 

There is no Sawiri listed as a director in any SA subsidiary or entity. Shareholding is private. Orascom Construction (attached) is a Sawiri entity but this is unrelated to coal. 

The Orascom directors 

Abou Tar Nagy/ID number 650309) is a director in Orascom Construction only. ID number 530204 belongs to Philip Megally, director of Orascom only. Ihab Mehawed, 720407; director of Orascom only. 

I chatted with an insider investment banker involved in coal and oil. He says that Sawiris, to his knowledge, are not present in SA for investment purposes. 

He is used as an insider intermediary in coal-related tenders. I'm inclined to place some weight in his opinion. It may be the case but for present time, no documentation to show for it.

comment:
Hi, to get Cyprus records you first need to create account with JCC Smart (https://www.jccsmart.com/). You don't need to register card with them. Once your card is registered you can order company records by selecting Study File. It will redirect you to JCC web site where you will put credit card number. After that you will get two e-mails, confirmation of payment and password to access records. User name is your e-mail address. Access it only valid till midnight Cyprus time so make sure you save information. And click on details for every ting. 

Good luck.

Best, Miranda

comment:
Hello Christian,

I hope you'll be able to understand English (maybe with a little help from Google Translate).
I did understand your request, but my French is not good enough to write.

The company from The British Virgin Islands you were looking for is a subsidiary of a big British company called
Victoria Oil & Gas PLC. As a proof of this I'm sending you their profile from Orbis (a big global databases of companies).

I'm also sending you a profile of this British company. It is rather long, but perhaps you'll find some useful information there too.

A former owner of Rodeo Development Ltd was also a British company Bramlin Ltd which belongs to the same network of companies.

If you're going into researching British companies, I strongly advice you to open a free account on www.duedil.com
They offer almost all the information on British companies for free (often including charges and mortgages).

As far as your previous research goes - where you mentioned company from Delaware and Bermuda. I did not quite understand if you have already confirmed this information, or you're still looking for it.
I didn't find any of these companies in the general databases. Getting documents about directors from Delaware and Bermuda is sometimes possible, but it can be very expensive and we'd have to ask you to cover the cost of the documents.
In case you're interested in this, please file separate requests.

I hope this is useful for you.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic
Researcher

P.S. I will send you all the documents via email, we're experiencing some technical difficulties with attaching documents here.
author: ah5zfmludmVzdGlnYXRpdmUtZGFzaGJvYXJkLXByb2RyGAsSC1VzZXJQcm9maWxlGICAgICAyqAKDA

comment:
Buenos días Louisa, 

Asfaltos de Guatemala SA, cuyo nombre comercial es 'Asfalgua', figura como proveedor del Estado de Guatemala en Guatecompras con el NIT 331546.
En este link puedes ver el estatus, los representantes legales y las adjudicaciones por concurso y sin concurso en las que resultó beneficiada: http://www.guatecompras.gt/proveedores/consultaDetProvee.aspx?rqp=9&lprv=1118

En el 2005 se la invitó a cotizar para un proyecto de aplicación de carpeta asfáltica de sexta calle sector norte Aldea del Carmen, junto con otras dos empresas guatemaltecas. Fue la que presentó el presupuesto más caro, según consta en un acta de Guatecompras. La municipalidad, indica el acta, tenía ya un plan con monto y días de ejecución. Y, luego de valorar las presentación, resolció adjudicárselo a Pavimentos de Guatemala SA.
El acta aquí: http://www.guatecompras.gt/Concursos/files/17/83828@ACTA%20ADJUDICACIN%20APLICACIN%20CARPETA%20ASFLTICA%20SEXTA%20CALLE%20SECTOR%20NORTE%20I%20ALDEA%20EL%20CARMEN.pdf

En el 2006 firmó el contrato administrativo de cotización numero catorce  - dos mil seis (14-2006) denominado “Suministro de dos mil cuatrocientas veinticinco (2,425) toneladas de mezcla asfáltica en caliente para el recapeo y bacheo de las calles y avenidas del Municipio de Mixco”. Tengo el documento del contrato si te sirve para enviártelo por mail. 

En 2010, se le adjudicó el proyecto CP-001: Km. 34 RN10-RAGUA 16 TRAMO DE LA CHOZA - BARCENAS. El informe del proceso de adjudicación de 13 proyectos de  mantenimiento de carreteras principales, a cargo de  la unidad de conservación vial 2012 aquí: file:///C:/Users/Sol%20Laur%C3%ADa/Downloads/20120222%20COVIAL-%20Proceso%20adjudicaci%C3%B3n%2013%20proyectos.pdf

Por el contrato ESCRITURA 26-2012, el Ministerio de Comunicacines, Infraestructura y Vivienda le otorgó a Asfaltos de Guatemala la obra de MEJORAMIENTO CARRETERA RN-01 DESVIO DE CA-01 A SOLOLÁ, SOLOLÁ A PANAJACHEL, SOLOLÁ. (PAVIMENTACIÓN) con un presupuesto de Q 50,000,000.00.
Ver el listado de proyectos aquí: http://www.fss.gob.gt/informacion/decreto-30-2012/articulo-69/69_g_11_2013.pdf

En las licitaciones públicas del FONDO SOCIAL DE SOLIDARIDAD 2012, figura que esa licitación número 27 de MEJORAMIENTO CARRETERA RN-01 DESVIO DE CA-01 A SOLOLA, SOLOLA A PANAJACHEL, SOLOLA (PAVIMENTACION) resultó para ASFALTOS DE GUATEMALA, S.A. (Q 49,980,040.65)  y que fueron descalificadas las empresas CODICO, 
CONASA y PAVIMENTOS DEL NORTE,S.A. 
Ver informe: file:///C:/Users/Sol%20Laur%C3%ADa/Downloads/LICITACIONES%20PUBLICAS%20FONDO%20SOCIAL%20DE%20SOLIDARIDAD%202012%20ACTUALIZADO%20AL%2030%20DE%20NOVIEMBRE%20DE%202012.pdf

En ese mismo informe (ver licitación 39) figura que la empresa fue descalificada para la licitación MEJORAMIENTO CARRETERA TRAMO: ROTONDA DE LOS TRIBUNALES A ROTONDA DE LA LICORERA, QUETZALTENANGO, QUETZALTENANGO, en la que resultó adjudicataria CONSTRUCTORA GSED-ALFA,S.A.

comment:
Hi

The company definately exists. It is sandwiched between the Mauritius holding company and Bagamoyo which is owned by it. The layering is designed toward complexity indicating need to conceal data (whether beneficial ownership, tax avoidance, thin capitalisation etc) and/or manufacture costs, shift profits etc. 

Company publicly claims that it is registered in Tanzania. The title Agro EcoEnergy Ltd (similar to Bagamoyo's name of EcoEnergy Ltd) is not the name registered on the country's corporate registry, the Brela database (which comes up blank), indicating that while it trades under the name, Agro Eco Energy it is registered under another name in Tanzania, and/or registered in a different jurisdiction (possibly clustered in Mauritius). 

Brela did not answer the phone on either of their four numbers, and there has been no response, as yet from the CEO, or manager. I also contacted the company using my business magazine credentials asking for their official corporate registry number etc. This number would allow for direct search (whatever the trading or reg name). 

I have also contacted local colleagues, including one who contributed to a report on the same company (EcoEnergy in Tanzania) for data. 

I will check in again tomorrow. I note your deadline. 

Khadija
author: ah5zfmludmVzdGlnYXRpdmUtZGFzaGJvYXJkLXByb2RyFAsSC1VzZXJQcm9maWxlGLnniQIM

/Valeria

comment:
Hi

I managed an EU enviro and climate project, so hey are only of my business reporting (positive) inquiry. No relation to you or any investigation around this. 

A colleague checked in physically yesterday at Brela: no reg of company under that name. But I am certain it is registered under a different name and trading under Agro.

He says that when Sekab sale occurred, local Tanzanian politicians were alleged to have received shares/positions etc. This may be why Agro, the Bagamoyo owner, is concealing details. 

I connected with Ally Bedford of IDC, claiming I was doing a positive business story on Tanzanian renewable energy. She referred me to Pers, the Agro head. He did not respond via email. The company does not answer calls (rings and is then disconnected). No official response from Brela. 

I will check in again today or tomorrow with more info. 

Khadija

comment:
These are the basics acquired by Finn from Brela. You may already have it. 

"Agro Eco Energy is a locally registered company, formerly Sekab BT, whose subsidiary is known as EcoEnergy Bagamoyo Limited.  Agro Eco Energy is 93.5% owned by Swedish based EcoEnergy Africa AB, 5% by Tanzanian Petroleum Development Corporation (TPDC) and 1.5% by Community Finance Corporation Ltd (CFC). 

TPDC is state owned while CFC is owned by three Tanzanians who Iam still trying to find their identity.
EcoEnergy Africa AB is a subsidiary company under EcoDevelopment in Europe AB, which has minority shares at Swedish based SEKAB, the original company which proposed the Bagamoyo ethanol project."

comment:
Hello Ann,

I've just attached all available files from the Cyprus registry. The company Spadi Trading is owned by a BVI company Interbeam Ltd.

We could order files from BVI for you. It costs US$25 just to get a company profile which lists address, incorporation date and registration agent. Every other document available also costs $25 + $1 per page for copies.
The problem is that they refuse to notify us what's available first. They just send what they've got and charge the credit card.

However, if you don't want to do this, you can just search for this company in the ICIJ's Offshore Leaks as well as the previous owners of Spadi - Group DF Ltd

Other than that, I'm also sending you a profile of Spadi from Orbis where you can see that through Zender Group Ltd they own other companies in U.K. too. 
If you have the possibility, It is always a good idea to get all the annual reports and other documents too for all the subsidiaries, you never know what kind of information they might reveal.

I hope this was helpful.

I will email you the invoice for the Cyprus records. It will be €10 + bank fees. 

Best,

Lejla Camdzic

comment:
Dear Ann,

We only provide free help to reporters from developing work. Since we are funded by donor money, when we help people who can afford business records, we need to ask either to cover cost or in some cases give us credit. 

Since this is Switzerland, easiest for you is to get records from official business registry: http://zefix.ch/zfx-cgi/hrform.cgi/hraPage?alle_eintr=on&pers_sort=original&pers_num=0&language=4&col_width=366&amt=007 

You can also order original records, but they will charge you depending on how many docs there are. Pay attention to document icon or anything clickable. This means additional info available online. 

You can also consult moneyhouse.ch.

Good luck. 

Miranda

Hi Ann,

Seychelles are unfortunately a very closed location. Their registry does not collect the information on directors and shareholders. The only ones who have it are the incorporation agents. 
I wasn't able to find Tridevi Consulting in any other databases. Your best bet was the U.K. registry. It is likely that this company is also just a service provider or nothing more than a holding company.

Sorry I wasn't able to help.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic

Hello Jiri,

I apologize that your request was on hold for a while. Jan Janku was not found anywhere else other than in Czech Republic.
It is more likely that he owns some offshore companies through some proxies who can be close associates or family members.

I found this name in one company in Austria, but I wasn't able to confirm if it is him indeed as he's got an Austrian address registered.

Countertop Ltd is registered is registered in Austria and I can get you records but you'd have to cover the cost. I'm sorry but our funds for journalists in European countries are very low. We're focused primarily on developing countries.

Let me know if you're willing cover the cost. It would be €10 + bank fees.

comment:
Hello Giovanni,

there is a form called International Search Request available on the website of the BVI Financial Services Commission.
You can fill it out and email it to the Commission. The records can be rather expensive and they may not reveal what you were looking for because it is not mandatory for companies to give any information to the registry. But if it's a big story it's worth a shot.

Also, annual report of your local company is much more likely to contain info on a subsidiary, if they have it in BVI.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic

comment:
Hello Angelina,

Investigative Dashboard belongs to a non-profit organization and it is a tool created to help journalists and researchers from the developing countries.
We do not perform services for due diligence companies and if we do we ask them to cover the cost of our researchers' time, obtaining of any potential records and participate in the costs of databases we subscribe to.
Building a profile for one person which will include companies that person appears in all over the world can take 2-3 weeks.

I am really sorry we were not able to help you. If you are still interested in some of the services I described, I will forward your request to my manager.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic
Researcher
Investigative Dashboard

comment:
Hello Aubrey,

these results are not collected from the actual company records. We have access to Lexis-Nexis.
They gather information from information providers in every country. We refer to it as "Google for companies".
Please do not publish these records. We never use them as proof in our stories. We always confirm all the information in the original company records.
As for Switzerland - information about company ownership is often published in the official gazette.
This is just for informational purposes and trying to find new interesting stories. 

Best,

Lejla

comment:
Querido Daniel, ¿cómo estas? 

Te cuento que Carlos Odin Velazco no aparece en ninguna compañía de Panamá. No sé de dónde habrán sacado el dato que lo relaciona con El Universal, pero el hecho de que no figure no quiere decir que no tenga vinculación: los accionistas de las compañías en Panamá (que son los verdaderos dueños) no aparecen nunca (es información protegida por ley). Te copio abajo información general de Tecnobreaks y Epalística. Si me pasas tu email, te envío todas las actas disponibles de la primera así las lees con calma (seguramente pueda surgir algo ahí).

TECNOBREAKS,INC. is a company registred in Panama. Here is the information. Please, send me your email and I will send you records available from Panama. 

TECNOBREAKS,INC. 
Number: 741121 
Date: 741121 
Capital: 1,000,000.00 
Legal Representative: JOSE ALEJANDRO QUIODETTIS 
Board of directors
President: EDUARDO ESCRIBANO LOPEZ DE LA OSA 
Treasurer: JOSE LUIS OTERO BASANTA 
Secretary: JOSE ANTONIO LOPEZ DE LA TORRE 
Suscriptores: NELSON GUEVARA JOSE ALEJANDRO QUIODETIS 

EPALISTICIA SL está inscrita en el Registro Mercantil de Madrid. Es una compañía bastante nueva, la fecha de registro es el 24 de julio de 2013. El NIF/CIF: B86791365 El objeto social es la "compra, venta, alquiler, parcelacion y urbanizacion de solares, terrenos y fincas de cualquier naturaleza, pudiendo proceder a la edificacion de los mismos y su enajenacion, integramente de forma parcial o en regimen de propiedad horizontal; la inversión en y administración de medios de comunicación, en especial, en mercados emergentes, con el fin de desarrollar nuevos modelos de digitalización de noticias nacionales e internacionales, procurando abarcar de formaplena la audiencia latinoamericana". A los cuatro meses (el 08/11/2013) ampliaron el objeto social a "la Inversión en y Administración de medios de comunicación, en especial en mercados emergentes, con el fin de desarrollar nuevos modelos de digitalización de noticias nacionales e internacionales, procurando abarcar de forma plena la Audiencia Latinoamericana". El domicilio: Paseo Del Pintor Rosales Nº18, 1º Derecha 28008 – Madrid. Capital: 3.500,00 Euros. Constancia de inscripción en el Registro Mercantil de España: http://www.boe.es/borme/dias/2013/08/14/pdfs/BORME-A-2013-154-28.pdf 

Directivos: Según la resolución 231045 publicada en el boletín oficial del Registro Mercantil, el administrador único es DE LA TORRE LOPEZ, JOSE ANTONIO. Consejeros: DE LA TORRE LOPEZ JOSE ANTONIO;LOPEZ DE LA OSA ESCRIBANO EDUARDO;GALLAECIA INVERGEST SL. Secretario: DE LA TORRE LOPEZ JOSE ANTONIO. Presidente: LOPEZ DE LA OSA ESCRIBANO EDUARDO. Delegado: GALLAECIA INVERGEST SL. Representante: BASANTA OTERO JOSE LUIS. Socio único: TECNOBREAKS INC. Datos registrales. T 31252 , F 159, S 8, H M 562552, I/A 5 (26.05.14). Ver: http://www.boe.es/borme/dias/2014/06/02/pdfs/BORME-A-2014-102-28.pdf Boletín Oficial del Registro Mercantil de Madrid Índice de empresas inscritas donde figura EPALISTICIA SL: http://www.boe.es/borme/dias/2014/06/02/pdfs/BORME-A-2014-102-99.pdf

comment:
Dear Hussein,  

The names of the shareholders of the companies registered in Panama (real owners of the company) is reserved information (lack of information about the owners). The Law 32 of February 26th, 1927 grants confidentiality to assets, identity, business and banking transactions.  In addition, Panamanian Sociedad Anonima does not permit the piercing of the corporate veil.  This regulation allows the Sociedad Anonima’s corporate books to be maintained completely private and confidential to any outsider. Piercing the corporate veil in Panama is considered an extraordinary remedy; the only way this remedy can be exercised is in cases of fraud or public violation.

Edgardo Eloy and Fernando Antonio Gil registred rhe company (this information is in the act attached, only one act). 

Probable Lejla will sent you Orbis files with more information.

Best,

Hello Abdulrahman,

EFG Hermes is a big investment bank. 
They are listed on the stock exchange in Egypt and in London. 
You can find a lot of information about them on http://www.londonstockexchange.com/

Cayman Islands is one of the locations where we (or anyone else probably) cannot get any information about companies.
I suggest you start from the local level and than take one aspect that you want to investigate.

Just to show you how big the structure of this investment bank is I am sending you two examples from Orbis database.
This is just for informational purpose and it's just an example. Please DO NOT publish this as proof.

If you come across some other aspects where you need help in you research, please feel free to file requests.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic

comment:
Zdravo,

firma ELW Global Logistics postoji u Južnoj Africi. Zamolit ću kolegicu koja tamo radi da nam pomogne, a u međuvremenu ovdje možeš naći profil firme sa Orbisa (koji je opća baza podataka o firmama iz cijelog svijeta).

Ono što je najvažnije je da je Orbis pokazao da u Bijeljini postoji firma ELW Global Balkan Bijeljina d.o.o.
Puno su veće šanse da će se svi detalji o firmi iz Afrike vidjeti ako zatražiš uvid u kompletan file u Bijeljini nego što se može vidjeti u Africi.

Firma jeste registrovana i u Dubaiju, ali je njeno sjedište u bescarinskoj zoni Jumeirah Lake Towers odakle nikada nismo uspjeli dobiti bilo kakve podatke o firmi.

Orbis je pokazao da su direktori firme u JAR Christopher Michael Miller i Nicholas James Vaughan Miller, ali u ovom trenutku o njima ne znam ništa više.

Firma sa imenom ELW Global UK Ltd registrovana je i u Velikoj Britaniji. Njen konačni vlasnik je firma Alexander Global Holdings is Ujedinjenih Arapskih Emirata i nisam još uspjela utvrditi ima li neke direktne veze sa Afričkom firmom.

Moj je konačni savjet da se prvo provjeri firma iz Bijeljine, pa ako ništa ne pokaže, možemo nastaviti pokušavati dalje.

Pozdrav,

Lejla

comment:
Hi Csaba,

the records of the Cyprus company are attached.
You'll see that the owner of 25% of shares is a company from Isle of Man. 
I wasn't able to find it on any of the commercial databases which we have access to, but Isle of Man does have registry of companies online. Let me know if the information we found on the Cyprus company is insufficient.

I just wanted to repeat here as well that we agreed for you to give credit to ID for the records that you receive from us.

Best,

Lejla

comment:
Hola Ismael, es un gusto saludarte.
Estuvimos rastreando a Yasser Alejandro en bases de EEUU y centroamérica y no encontramos nada particular. Solo dos menciones:
1) En la Gaceta Oficial de Nicaragua, donde consta: "POR CUANTO YASSER ALEJANDRO ARAUZ ROJAS, Natural de Chinandega, Departamento de Chinandega, República de Nicaragua, ha cumplido con todos los requisitos académicos del Plan de Estudios de su carrera y las pruebas establecidas en las disposiciones Vigentes. POR TANTO Le extiende el Título de Licenciado Administración de Empresas, para que goce de los derechos y prerrogativas que las leyes y reglamentos del ramo le conceden. Dado en la ciudad de Managua, República de Nicaragua, a los treinta días del mes de julio del año dos mil diez." 
2) En un documento del Indes de El Salvador: http://indes.gob.sv/attachments/article/1201/BOLETIN%20No.%201.pdf. 

Tal vez si nos dieras más precisiones de la pista que estás siguiendo podamos ayudarte más: ¿Crees que tiene una empresa? ¿Buscas records judiciales? En fin, qué es exactamente lo que estas rastreando.
Quedo pendiente, mientras te dejo saludos,

Sol Lauria

Hello Ismael,

I have searched this name in some worldwide databases which we have access to - Orbis and Lexis-Nexis and I haven't found that he personally owns a company anywhere. 
This of course doesn't mean that he doesn't own real estate or that some of his close associates do not own companies or property on his behalf.

To find out what a person owns worldwide is a very long process. I suggest you try to do some research first about who his closest associates and maybe you will find some leads. 

I will also ask our researcher in Panama to see what she can do.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic
Researcher

comment:
I checked on Orbis and LexisNexis. There is no person with this name and the same date of birth you gave us. I looked for different variations of his name (Rachid, Rashid, Rached, Rashed, Rasheed, Racheed). 

I found Rachid Mohamed Rachid (Cypriot), born 09/02/1955 in company Nauras Business Consulting Limited, registered in London. You can search for that company in DueDil.com as for others UK companies. Create an account on DueDil and look for information about the company, people involved in it and shareholders.
The same person (same name and date of birth) is one of directors in company Pepsi Lipton International Limited.
In LexisNexis I found person Rashed Mohamed Rashed in company Egyptian Natural Gas Holding Company. He is listed as Vice Chairman.

Here is information from DueDil about this guy: 
https://www.dropbox.com/s/7r00tsducpybvm3/RACHID%20MOHAMED%20RACHID_DueDil.zip?dl=0

If you are sure that it is him maybe, you can search for more information on DueDil. If you need more help about that, let me know.

comment:
Dear Anne,

our lead investigator Miranda offered to send you her presentation from March this year which she had in Sweden.

Since Investigative Dashboard operates on donor funds, we are only able to help reporters in developing parts of the world for free. For western media we have to ask for cost of records to be covered.

In this case, there are 4 companies that we need to update records on and that would cost 40 Euros. Would you be able to cover this cost?

Since this is a research we already did in the past, we will not charge for researcher's time.

Thank you for understanding. We hope we'll be able to help.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic
Researcher

comment:
Hi Dragana,
Thank you! I sent the following message to Miranda some minutes ago:
---

Hi Miranda. Dragana has done a great job, and to get the compete overview,
I wonder if I should come to Sarajevo to meet you and her. The reasons why
I am thinking about is, are the following:
* I have not been working with cross border economic investigations
earlier, and I need to be sure which steps I am taking.
* I need help to see the important networks.
* I need help to se the networks between the owners.
* I need help to spot the Norwegian angles. One example: In one of the
files Dragana sent me, about Bettson, I see that The Government of Norway
is among the shareholders. Good story, bu*t *I will need further
explanation.
For me, it would be perfect to come to Sarajevo Monday-Wednesday November
3th-5th. Would that be possible for you?

So, I cross my fingers and hope it is possible to meet you both.

Best, John

comment:
Hi Andras,

Lichtenstein is secretive jurisdiction and not even authorities have ownership information about companies. This is link to business registry: http://www.oera.li/hrweb/eng/firmensuche.htm 

Some additional info can be requested but to obtain them you need to prove you are interested party. In previous cases we tried arguing public interest but authorities did not accept it.

Best, Miranda

comment:
Hi Anit! Here are same information about the Company. 
About the owners: the names of the shareholders of the companies registered in Panama (real owners of the company) is reserved information (lack of information about the owners). The Law 32 of February 26th, 1927 grants confidentiality to assets, identity, business and banking transactions. In addition, Panamanian Sociedad Anonima does not permit the piercing of the corporate veil. This regulation allows the Sociedad Anonima’s corporate books to be maintained completely private and confidential to any outsider. Piercing the corporate veil in Panama is considered an extraordinary remedy; the only way this remedy can be exercised is in cases of fraud or public violation. 
Anyway, we have some public information.
I have attached original records from Panama.
Let me know if you need more help.
Best,
Sol Lauría

Dear Kristina,

I am really sorry for waiting on our response. 
Unfortunately, we can not help you in getting annual reports about Cypriot companies. 
We now don't have enough researchers and we can't assign one of them to work on getting these annual reports. 
We can only suggest you to call the registry. Here you can find contact numbers of their offices: 
http://www.mcit.gov.cy/mcit/drcor/drcor.nsf/contactus_en/contactus_en?OpenDocument
According to our experience, you will probably have to call each of these numbers and try to get someone who would be kind to help you. Sorry for not giving to much help and good luck with it.
If there is anything else in which we can help, you can send us another request.

All the best, 
Dragana

comment:
Dear Jetlir,

We checked name of persons and companies in data bases that are available to us (local business registries, Orbis, LexisNexis). We found companies you mentioned in your request. 

Here is the link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/a9pp300r9rsgi81/Mehmet%20Berisha.zip?dl=0
where you can download folder with information about companies MEAR S.A.R.L. from Luxembourg Official Gazzete in which Avni Sylaj was appointed as director, companies Mear Construction and Mear Solutiones. Unfortunately, we didn't find any direct connections between Mehmet Berisha and Avni Sylaj. 

There are also other information about Mehmet Berisha and Avni Sylaj, but in some cases we are not sure are those persons the same because there is no information like date of birth. For example, we found that person named Mehmet Berisha (35 years old) was charged with conspiracy. This information is from 2007 when he was 35 year old, so it could be the same person but we are not sure. 

One important thing about it -- we use Orbis and Lexis for references or checking information only. You should not publish those records or use them as proof. This is because those are commercial databases which gather their information from local information providers, not necessarily from official company registries. Information in it might be outdated as well.

We hope all this we are sending to you can help. 
Let us know if you need any other information.

Kind regards,
Dragana

comment:
Hi Ion,

Insidown is 50% owned by Belserve Consultants Ltd (CY) which is a well known incorporation, legal and consultancy agency in Cyprus:
http://www.cyprusbarassociation.org/v1/index.php/en/asp/401

The other 50% is owned by Vaspaco Properties Ltd (CY). I bought their records as well but they did not reveal much. You can search for the person who is the only shareholder on google. It looks like it's a proxy.

I found Vaspaco Properties here as well in a 2012 report of Expobank from Russia where it says that Despo Andreou owns Vaspaco
http://expobank.ru/en/openinfo/info/list_25-01-12.pdf
According to Cyprus records he stopped being the owner in 2014.

Please let us know if these documents lead to Victorbank and in what ways.

Best,

Lejla

comment:
Hi Devlin,

unfortunately Seychelles are a very closed location. Nothing can be obtained from their registry. They say that they do not even collect the information on directors and shareholders.
So the British company was your best bet. Normally, when a company registers a subsidiary they file a documents that prove their identity. Peak Palm Oil is also a public company, so more information should be available for them. Try getting all of them from the Companies House.

Unfortunately, Investigative Dashboard is a tool intended to help journalists in the developing countries so we cannot do this for you unless you cover the cost of research.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic
Researcher

comment:
Hi Devlin,

Mauritius offers several categories of companies to be registered there. The company you're looking for is registered as:
Global Business - Category 1.
I contacted their registry several times and I was reassured by the Principal Compliance Officer, Mrs. Edun that all the information and records about this category of companies is treated as confidential.
If you'd like, you can contact her yourself. Her phone number is +230 211-2867
I'm really sorry, I couldn't have done more.

The local registry and the records of Wanbao África Agriculture Development are your best bet for discovering who's behind it.

Best,

Lejla

comment:
Estimada Guadalupe, ¿cómo estas? Lamentablemente no hay registros de cobro de seguro en USA a nombre de Miranda Torres o Wallace Miranda. Suponemos que es porque en USA la legislación dice que si no hay cadáver, no hay forma de cobrar un seguro. Difiere con relación a algunos países de AL, donde aún sin cadáver se puede cobrar seguros. Pero en USA ni modo.

Encontramos en bases de datos de Florida dos empresas con nombres similares a 'Show Case'. Copio registros a continuación. 

SHOWCASE PUBLISHING, INC.: http://search.sunbiz.org/Inquiry/CorporationSearch/SearchResultDetail/EntityName/domp-h22360-d218b72b-bbb6-47ce-b74e-40e8c106442b/Show%20Case%20Publicidad/Page1

SHOWCASE PUBLISHING INTERNATIONAL, INC.:
Aquí el documento de alta: http://search.sunbiz.org/Inquiry/CorporationSearch/ConvertTiffToPDF?storagePath=COR%5C0608%5C0624%5CCH000388.tif&documentNumber=P95000007886
Aquí otros datos de la compañía: http://search.sunbiz.org/Inquiry/CorporationSearch/SearchResultDetail/EntityName/domp-p95000007886-664bce97-4aeb-43e1-ba93-77858876c865/Show%20Case%20Publicidad/Page1

Quedo pendiente por si hay alguna otra manera de ayudarte en la investigación. 
Saludos!

comment: Muchas gracias, todo bien. Sigo con la investigación. Nunca apareció el cadáver, porque no sucedió el crimen. Fue fabricado. Encontré dos testigos, pero estoy buscando manera de conseguirles protección porque están dispuestos a declarar y ellos estuvieron con Hugo después de la fecha de su supuesta muerte. Tengo bien documentadas las torturas a los inculpados a quienes dieron sentencia de hasta 131 años de cárcel. Respecto al seguro pienso que fue en Miami, Florida. Mandé carta a la Asociación Nacional de Insurance Fraud en EEUU, pero no he recibido respuesta todavía. Muchas gracias por la valiosa ayuda. Saludos.

Hello Abd Elrahman,

it seems like you already have the essential information about this topic and about AlJazeera.
AlJazeera is ultimately owned and financed by Qatar government. The original records therefore will not show any changes in the ownership structure.
Private companies cannot own and operate satellite dishes, true.

It is not clear from your request precisely what information you need. Could you please be more specific?

Best,

Lejla Camdzic

comment:
Dear Kristine,

I'm really sorry that I've only gotten to your request now, on the day of your deadline.
However, it seems to me that we would not be able to help without doing the actual reporting part of the job and we don't do that for our users. We simply don't have resources for that.

We provide company, court, financial records, advice or some missing links.
However, I realized that you were looking for a whole connection between two companies for which you already knew the ownership and background. 
Also, by "transfers" you probably meant money transfers. Bank records are not even public. Some transactions with political parties and public institutions can be traced but that's also a few months of reporting to prove.

I am really sorry. If you ever need any help with a specific person or a company we'd be happy to offer you our services. And I just want to say that we help media in the developing countries for free, but organizations which are not partners and organizations from western countries do have to pay for our services.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic
Researcher
author: ah5zfmludmVzdGlnYXRpdmUtZGFzaGJvYXJkLXByb2RyGAsSC1VzZXJQcm9maWxlGICAgICAyqAKDA

comment:
Dear Alice,

Investigative Dashboard is a tool intended to help journalists with specific companies, people, records or resources. We do not do reporting part of the work. 
We mainly work with journalists from the developing countries and we are funded by donors to provide them help.
When it comes to working with commercial media - we can help as well but we charge for our services or we form partnerships to work on large scale projects.

Once you figure out if there is a story about Mr. Guistra there and if you are stuck on a specific company or another detail, please do file a request and we will let you know how we can help. This one looks a little too broad.

Kind regards,

Lejla Camdzic

comment:
Hello,

your request is a little too general. We do not do research or provide elaborate market overviews.
We are a non profit organization aimed at helping investigative journalists in the developing countries of specific regions.
We help journalist when they already have a story that they are trying to gather evidence for. We research specific people and specific companies.

If you have a story where you need a few specific pointers, companies or people, please contact us again.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic
Researcher

comment:
Dear Tamas,

Sorry for waiting for our reply. We double-checked with BVI business registry about your company and they replied that there is no such company named STRINGSTON LIMITED. That's why they send information about STRINGSTONES.

Here is what they replied:
"Please be advised that there is no company on our register by the name of STRINGSTON LIMITED. We had a company on our register by the name of STRINGSTONES LIMITED however it changed its name to RUSSIAN COMBINES LIMITED. Maybe, the officer who processed your R820 Form used to make the request thought that you simply omitted the “ES” from the company’s name by mistake in addition to the fact that there is no “STRINGSTON LIMITED” registered in the BVI, which led to this situation."

If you need anything else, let us know.

Cheers, 
Dragana

comment:
Dear Levon,

Investigative Dashboard is a tool designed to help journalists in uncovering some specific details during their investigative reporting. Our donors cover the cost for helping journalists in the developing parts of the world. We also cooperate with media organizations in other countries but they cover the cost of researchers' time and the cost of obtaining records.

Your organization Harrisonburg-Rockingham Community Services Board seems to be helping people with mental health, intellectual disability, and substance abuse. Is this correct?

Finding documents that confirm or deny the claims you listed in your request would take several weeks of research work and we never do reporting for our users. We only assist them with missing pieces of the puzzle.
Finding out who H. Samuel Lenox is and what his role was is too broad.

I see that you found plenty of information online. Finding out if the relationship between all these companies exists would take a lot of time. From the document you linked here it seems that this company only has a mailing address in TX and that it is registered in Great Falls MT.

Respectfully,

Lejla Camdzic
Researcher

Hi Adrian,

here's what I've got so far:
I'm sending you a profile from Orbis for the Austrian company S&T System Integration... which owns minority in Sandt Holding Ltd. It's ownership is clear and you should be able to find their annual reports online too.

Stotens Finance Ltd (Cyprus) is owned by Darween Establishment (LI) according to Orbis. I didn't buy the original records yet because I'd like to know if this is for a known story or is it a pre-research still.
I don't know who owns Darween yet, but other than Stotens Finance Ltd, they also have a subsidiary in Austria - Stotens GmbH

Please take a look at the files I attached and let me know if they helped.
I also need to know if you're doing this for a story or is it just fishing. Also, if you end up using this in a story, we'd have to ask you to give credit to ID. Would that be ok by you?

Thanks.

Lejla Camdzic

comment:
Also, our reporter from Azerbaijan just wrote this to me:

Tax ministry's website provides following data:

Company name, 
date of registration
legal address, 
registration capital
director (legal representative)

They used to provide shareholders as well, but closed it in 2012. We scraped data before it was closed so we have data Jan, 2008 - Apr 1 2012. 

Legislation has changed in June 2012. And since then the Tax Ministry denies information, referring to new laws. Ownership data is commercial secret according to law. 

For listed companies (banks, insurance companies and OJSC) there is a website  of Baku Stock Exchange. Whenever the company sells shares it has to provide all data - emission prospect, financial statement, which also includes ownership data. Some companies hid ownership data after the legislative changes in 2012 in their emission prospects as well.
author: ah5zfmludmVzdGlnYXRpdmUtZGFzaGJvYXJkLXByb2RyGAsSC1VzZXJQcm9maWxlGICAgICAyqAKDA

comment:
Hola Lucio, un gusto saludarte.

Intentaremos ayudarte, pero es un poco difícil establecer lo que nos consultas. Tal vez si tienes nombres de empresas podemos rastrearlas y ver quiénes figuran, quiénes son los directores y se podrís determinar si los nombres que consultas están relacionados. De todas maneras, buscamos y encontramos información que tal vez te de pistas. Te adjunto los documentos y detallo abajo el contenido. Dinos si podemos ayudarte más. 

La compañía Image Promotion Company IPC inscribió los estatutos en Mónaco el 27 de junio de 2000. Adjunto en el documento 'Estatuto IMAGE PROMOTION COMPANY' la copia del estatuto que publicó el boletín oficial del Principado de Mónaco. 

ANTONIO CALIENDO figura también en registros de United Kindom como director de QUEENS PARK RANGERS FOOTBALL & ATHLETIC CLUB,LIMITED (UK) desde el 25 Noviembre de 2005 al 31 de agosto de 2007. también aparece como director de QPR HOLDINGS LIMITED (UK) del 25 Nov 2005 a 26 Oct 2007. 

Caliendo ideó el "Paseo de la Champions" en Mónaco, según nota de prensa del Principado: http://www.presse.gouv.mc/304/wwwnew.nsf/1909$/1fb3b9a84e695acfc12574b7005289abfr?OpenDocument&1Fr

En el documento 'Superior Tribunal de Justicia' se detalla el caso AGRAVO EM RECURSO ESPECIAL Nº 469391 - RS (2014/0020171-9). El mismo tiene como agravante a 'RS FUTEBOL CLUBE LTDA', como agravados a 'CARLOS CAETANO BLEDORN VERRI', JUAREZ ROSA DA SILVA y IMAGE PROMOTION COMPANY IPC. 

En el documento adjunto 'COURT OF ARBITRATION FOR SPORT' se describe un caso que menciona a Mr Antonio Caliendo como testigo de un caso promovido por Mr Ariel Arnaldo ORTEGA con FIFA. También se nombra allí a la empresa "Image Promotion Company" como portadora de un pago USD 1.500.000 del club turco en el que jugó Ortega por los derechos de imagen del jugador. En el documento queda claro que  Antonio Caliendo era representante del jugador y que la empresa 'Image' cobró por los derechos de imagen del jugador. 

En el documento COMPLETE LIST OF PLAYERS' AGENTS IN ITALY, Antonio CALIENDO figura como uno de los agentes del fútbol italiano con la empresa "Image Promotion Company, con domicilio en 5 Bis Av. Princesse Alice - 98000 Principato di Monaco.

comment:
Hello Lucio,

please use Google Translate because I do not speak Portuguese so well.
As you'll see we found some information. However, we cannot establish connections between people. Our researchers cannot do the reporting part of the work for you only provide you pieces of the puzzle.
I did find the company in Monaco you mentioned. However, it is difficult to get information about owners and directors from Monaco.
Would your organization be willing to cover the cost of getting actual documents?
We can only do work for free for smaller media in the developing countries because our donors only fund that.

Also, in case you use this information in your story, would you be willing to give credit to the Investigative Dashboard?

Best,

Lejla Camdzic
Researcher

comment:
Hola Eduardo, un gusto saludarte.
Efectivamente EPALISTICIA SL está inscrita en el Registro Mercantil de Madrid. Es una compañía bastante nueva, la fecha de registro es el 24 de julio de 2013. El NIF/CIF: B86791365
El objeto social es la "compra, venta, alquiler, parcelacion y urbanizacion de solares, terrenos y fincas de cualquier naturaleza, pudiendo proceder a la edificacion de los mismos y su enajenacion, integramente de forma parcial o en regimen de propiedad horizontal; la inversión en y administración de medios de comunicación, en especial, en mercados emergentes, con el fin de desarrollar nuevos modelos de digitalización de noticias nacionales e internacionales, procurando abarcar de formaplena la audiencia latinoamericana". 
A los cuatro meses (el 08/11/2013) ampliaron el objeto social a "la Inversión en y Administración de medios de comunicación, en especial en mercados emergentes, con el fin de desarrollar nuevos modelos de digitalización de noticias nacionales e internacionales, procurando abarcar de forma plena la Audiencia Latinoamericana".

El domicilio: Paseo Del Pintor Rosales Nº18, 1º Derecha 28008 – Madrid.
Capital: 3.500,00 Euros. 

Constancia de inscripción en el Registro Mercantil de España: http://www.boe.es/borme/dias/2013/08/14/pdfs/BORME-A-2013-154-28.pdf

Directivos:
Según la resolución 231045 publicada en el boletín oficial del Registro Mercantil, el administrador único es DE LA TORRE LOPEZ, JOSE ANTONIO. 
Consejeros: DE LA TORRE LOPEZ JOSE ANTONIO;LOPEZ DE LA OSA ESCRIBANO EDUARDO;GALLAECIA INVERGEST SL. 
Secretario: DE LA TORRE LOPEZ JOSE ANTONIO. 
Presidente: LOPEZ DE LA OSA ESCRIBANO EDUARDO. 
Delegado: GALLAECIA INVERGEST SL. 
Representante: BASANTA OTERO JOSE LUIS. 
Socio único: TECNOBREAKS INC. 
Datos registrales. T 31252 , F 159, S 8, H M 562552, I/A 5 (26.05.14).
Ver: http://www.boe.es/borme/dias/2014/06/02/pdfs/BORME-A-2014-102-28.pdf

Boletín Oficial del Registro Mercantil de Madrid Índice de empresas inscritas donde figura EPALISTICIA SL: http://www.boe.es/borme/dias/2014/06/02/pdfs/BORME-A-2014-102-99.pdf

EPALISTICIA SL no está inscrita en el Registro Público de Panamá (salvo que haya sido dada de alta hace muy poco tiempo y no haya llegado a actualizarse en la versión online). 
Pero sí aparece registrada en Panamá la empresa que figura como "socio único" de EPALISTICIA SL en el Registro Mercantil de Madrid: TECNOBREAKS INC. 
Los datos generales de TECNOBREAKS INC. (fijate que se repiten en ambas los directivos, o sea que es la misma). Los copio a continuación. Si me pasas tu email te envío las actas.

TECNOBREAKS INC.
Número de ficha: 741121 
Fecha de Registro: 11-07-2011 
Agente residente: JOSE ALEJANDRO QUIODETTIS 
EL CAPITAL SOCIAL AUTORIZADO SERA DE UN MILLON DE BALBOAS DIVIDIDO EN MIL ACCIONES COMUNES Y NOMINATIVAS CON UN VALOR_NOMINAL DE CIEN BALBOAS CADA UNA.
PRESIDENTE: EDUARDO ESCRIBANO LOPEZ DE LA OSA
TESORERO: JOSE LUIS OTERO BASANTA
SECRETARIO: JOSE ANTONIO LOPEZ DE LA TORRE

Suscriptores:
NELSON GUEVARA 
JOSE ALEJANDRO QUIODETIS

comment:
Hola Santiago, ¿cómo estas? Supongo que podemos hablar en castellano, ¿cierto?
Te copio a continuación un detalle de las empresas con sus adjuntos (eso va en inglés por las dudas). Miralos y dinos si necesitas algún dato que esté faltando. 

HKND Group HOLDINGS.
Registration at Cayman Islands: https://online.ciregistry.gov.ky/cos/faces/cos/ListParties.jspx

HK Nicaragua Canal Development Investment Co., Ltd (HKND)
Hong Kong Registry: https://www.icris.cr.gov.hk/csci/cns_basic_comp.do

Empresa Desarrolladora de Grandes Infraestructuras SA (EDGI)
Nicaraguan company. HK Nicaragua Canal bought it April 12 2013 with the purpose of promoting the project. Wang Jing also directed this company, the face in Nicaragua of China’s company. EDGI was registrate by the lawyer Rodrigo Antonio Taboga on November 15th 2012. 

BEIJING XIWEI TELECOM TECHNOLOGY: 
Wang Jing is the boss and largest shareholder of Beijing Xinwei Telecom Technology Co, a telecoms company formerly owned by State-owned Datang Telecom. He has a share of 1,100 million in the company: 37 percent to 23 may, according to government records.

Quedo pendiente, mientras te dejo saludos,

Sol Lauría
Data Research

comment:
Hola Sol, 

Muchas gracias por lo que me has enviado. Ayer escribí un mensaje largo pero desafortunadamente se borró porque tuve un problema con internet. Decía que he avanzado desde que escribí esta solicitud y tengo más claro qué empresas de su circuito quisiera mirar a fondo, pero todo lo que me has dado me es útil porque no lo tenía. Tengo dificultad accediendo a las siguientes direcciones porque me solicitan claves de acceso que no tengo.
1)  https://online.ciregistry.gov.ky/cos/faces/cos/ListParties.jspx
2) https://www.icris.cr.gov.hk/csci/cns_basic_comp.do
3) Me interesa muchísimo el registro de Skyrizon Aircraft Holdings Limited, también de Wang Jing y registrada en British Virgin Islands.
4) Es posible encontrar el registro de Beijing Dayang Xinhe Investment Ltd. ? Es según la estructura corporativa de Wang Jing, la dueña de HK Nicaragua Canal Development Investment Co., Ltd 

¿Hay alguna manera que pudieras subir los archivos  a nuestra conversación como los otros pdf? He intentado acceder a ellos y no me es posible. 
El lunes envío una primera entrega de esta investigación a Nicaragua, para su publicación en la revista de Carlos Fernando Chamorro (Premio José Maria Moors Cabot de la Universidad de Columbia, 2010). Luego, en diciembre, una segunda entrega. Si es posible incluir algo de esto para el lunes sería fantástico, pero no quiero abusar de tu tiemp. Muchas gracias, Sol por toda tu ayuda. 

Saludos, 
Santiago Villa

Hello Dritan, 

My name is Miranda Patrucic and I am regional editor for OCCRP for the Balkans. I don't know the substance of your complaint, but normally person who complained can inquire about the status of the case. I suggest you try doing that.

You can reach me at miranda@occrp.org.

Warm regards, Miranda

Te adjunto documentos que transmiten el ideario, pensamiento y modo de actuar de la Juventud Sandinista:
1) Estatutos del Frente Sandinista de Liberación: http://americo.usal.es/oir/opal/Documentos/Nicaragua/FSLN/ESTATUTOS1998.pdf
2) Declaración del II Encuentro Internacional de Juventudes y Estudiantes de Izquierda de Latinoamérica y el Caribe. comment:
Dear Leo,

I see the bases for the continuation of the research of this story was GRAIN's story.
We helped them as well, but not so much in Senegal, I believe you might ask them to tell you how (or if) they got records on companies Senethanol and Senhuile.

I will send you company profile from Oribs on Senhuile but please do not consider it as a proof and do not publish that profile. If you intend to use that information for your story, please confirm it from original reports and records.

I also spent quite a lot of time trying to find more information on Agro Bioethanol LLC and we got all the records that were available at the registry in New York, but they didn't reveal much. I will send you all of those as well.

I searched for name Gora Seek on Orbis and Lexis but I didn't find anything. If you'd like me to search for that in detail, please provide some more details (date of birth, nationality, possible name spelling variations etc)

Best,

Lejla Camdzic
Researcher

comment:
Dear Fiona,

We checked name John Hume in data bases that are available to us (Orbis and LexisNexis). 
Here is the link for downloading the results:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/i6lrcigw2ylfm54/John%20Hume.zip?dl=0

In this folder you will find information about persons named John Hume and in most of the cases there is no data of birth and we were not sure is that the same person or not. Anyway, we are sending you all the results we found. 

One important thing about it -- we use Orbis and Lexis for references or checking information only. You should not publish those records or use them as proof. This is because those are commercial databases which gather their information from local information providers, not necessarily from official company registries. Information in it might be outdated as well.

We hope all this we are sending to you can help. 
Let us know if you need any other information.

Kind regards,
Dragana

comment:
Dear Prabhat,

your request is really too broad. We do not do reporting or investigating for other reporters, we just help them when they encounter an obstacle.

You can file a request with a specific name of the person or a name of the company which you have problems identifying.
We also do not have statistics about the trades, multinational companies which have people from Nepal in them. This is all information which you can discover doing field work in Nepal.

When you gather the names you're interested in please file separate requests for each one and give us as much detail about them as you can - their dates of birth, their close relative who might serve as their cover, their addresses and any other information that you might help us identify them.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic
Researcher

comment:
Dear Dragana,

thank you for your help.

Sadly, the BVI file won't be of much use - it seems it does include virtually nothing - no owners, no directors etc. Also, it seems it was incorporated only in '95 - so no chance the company mentioned in the report I obtained and the one implicated in the Emfesz scheme is one and the same. 

Looking at the other Ruland companies, I believe there is some possibility that the Cyprus one is the one mentioned in the report, and also if that is so, I have enough circumstantial evidence to imply Yukos in the Emfesz scheme.

So, if you would be so kind, could you provide me with the file of the Cyprus-registered company? The name is Ruland Ltd. or Ruland (Cyprus) Ltd.

Thank you very much,
Márton

comment:
Hola Luminita,

Mucho gusto, encantados de ayudarte. Estoy rastreando 'Proyecto Magistral' y me surgen dudas: ¿ese es el nombre de un proyecto concreto en Durango, México, pero no de las empresas que intervienen en él, ¿cierto?

En el estudio de impacto ambiental de la Secretaría de medio Ambiente de México figura con el nombre 'Proyecto Magistral, S. de R.L. de C.V.'. En el estudio de impacto ambiental realizado por una consultora aparecen dos empresas involucradas en el Proyecto: 'Procesadora Magistral S. de R.L. de C.V.' y 'Compañía Minera Magistral del Oro S.A. de C.V.', que serían los propietarios del terreno.

Adjunto los dos documentos para que los puedas ver. Fijate que en el último, el estudio de impacto ambiental de la Consultora, indica también que Procesadora Magistral antes de 2004 se denominaba 'Aguas Auríferas Separación, S. de R.L. de C.V.'.

Copio textual: "Escritura pública No. 70,328 setenta mil trescientos veintiocho, de fecha 22 de octubre de 2004, otorgada ante la fé del Lic. Miguel Alessio Robles, Notario Público NO. 19 del Distrito Federal, mediante la cual se protocoliza el contacto de  Sociedad de Aguas Auríferas Separación, S. de R.L. de C.V. (...)  escritura pública No. 70,493 setenta mil cuatrocientos
noventa y tres, de fecha 08 de noviembre de 2004, otorgada ante la fé del Lic. Miguel Alessio
Robles, Notario Público No. 19 del Distrito Federal, mediante la cual se protocoliza la Asamblea
General Extraordinaria de Socios de Aguas Auríferas Separación, S. de R.L. de C.V. celebrada el
26 de octubre de 2004, misma que contiene entre otros asuntos el cambio de denominación de
Aguas Auríferas Separación, S. de R.L. de C.V. a Procesadora Magistral S. de R.L. de C.V. y, copia
del contrato de arrendamiento celebrado el 15 de diciembre de 2004 por Compañía Minera 
Magistral del Oro S.A. de C.V.". 

Y más adelante: "La empresa Procesadora Magistral, S. de R.L. de C.V., promovente de este proyecto exhibe la documentación legal (escrituras) donde se hace constar que Compañía Minera Magistral del Oro S.A. de C.V., son los legítimos propietarios de las 17-47-77 has., mismos que arrendaran el terreno, equipo e infraestructura existente al promovente". 

Por lo tanto deduzco que querrás información sobre los dueños de Procesadora Magistral, S. de R.L. de C.V. Si me confirmases este dato, buscamos por ahí. 
Quedo pendiente, mientras te dejo saludos,

Sol

comment:
Hello Karen,

Investigative Dashboard is a tool created to help journalists mostly in developing countries. We are a project of Organized Crime and Corruption Reporting Project - www.occrp.org
I can help you by giving you a link to Panamanian official business registry where you can search for companies yourself (alphabetically and by number) and download the original records. To do this, you need to create an account first.
The link is www.registro-publico.gob.pa

We are able to perform commercial work, so in case you would be interested, this is what the costs would be:
- Orbis and Lexis-Nexis Check - 100 USD per request
- Company and other records - covering the cost
- Research fee - 200 USD
- Additional research - 50 USD per hour
OCCRP reserves the right to use research for future investigation. All records are made available to public 3 months after research (no extension). Will provide basic records if requested by another media.

In anything is unclear about our conditions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic

comment:
Buenos días Marvin. 
Una consulta: ¿qué información específicamente estás buscando sobre la empresa o Santana? ¿Qué quieres o neceistas saber?

Mientras nos respondes, te adelanto que efectivamente la empresa POLIS PROPAGANDA E MARKETING LTDA. está  registrada en Brasil.

En Salvador como agencia de publicidad con ese mismo nombre. Con el nombre 'DIGITAL POLIS PROPAGANDA E MARKETING LTDA' está  registrada en San Pablo, con el número 35227782568 , desde el 23 de agosto de 2013.
Aquí la información: https://www.jucesponline.sp.gov.br/Pre_Visualiza.aspx?nire=35227782568&idproduto=

En Panamá, se registró el 11 de junio de 2013 con el nombre Polis América SA (se envió por mail el acta de creación). 

El 9 de julio de 2009 se registró una empresa a su nombre en El Salvador: POLISTEPEQUE, S.A. DE C.V. Aquí el documento: http://www.cnr.gob.sv/documentos/rc/julio_agosto_2009/Sociedades%20constituidas.pdf

Quedamos atentos a tus especificaciones, 

Sol.

It would probably be best not to publish these documents. You can trust all the info from the Swiss gazette which I've also included of course but it would be good to recheck it before you publish the story.

I know you're looking for ownership, but at the moment I don't have access to the gazette files and that's the only place where that could possibly appear.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic

comment:
Zdravo Amarildo,

ovdje na stranici, u prilogu Vašeg zahtjeva možete naći bonitetni izvještaj, novčane tokove i historijat transakcijskih računa.

Pronašla sam također i vlasničku strukturu, ali jedini način da dobijete kompletan i potpuno tačan vlasnički historijat je da pošaljete zahtjev Općinskom sudu u Mostaru. Ove informacije su dostupne prema Zakonu o slobodnom pristupu informacijama i prema mom iskustvu mogu Vam rezultate poslati poštom nakon što uplatite sudsku taksu, ali znam da su neke kolege jedino lično mogle preuzeti fotokopije.

Također Vas želim zamoliti da ove dokumente ne objavljujete, jer bonitetni izvještaji izdvajaju samo neke parametre iz punih finansijskih izvještaja i ne daju cjelovitu sliku o poslovanju firme.

S poštovanjem,

Lejla Čamdžić

comment:
Querida Cecilia,

Una consulta como la tuya requiere un trabajo específico que incluiría muchísimas consultas a instituciones en México, utilizando las posibilidades de ley de acceso a la información pública en el país (consulta aquí: http://inicio.ifai.org.mx/_catalogs/masterpage/ifai.aspx). Nuestros investigadores realizan búsquedas de empresas en español y pueden ayudarte con búsquedas de records en la red profunda, pero no pueden hacer el trabajo de reportería y consultas por los periodistas. 
Si necesitas nuestra ayuda con alguna persona específica o compañía que consideras interesante para investigar, estaremos encantados de ayudarte y trabajar para ti.
Te deseamos la mejor de la suerte.
Lejla Camdzic

comment:
¡Hola de nuevo Eduardo! Mira, después de una búsqueda muy profunda aparecen pistas pero no records, porque parece que Ebisu Multicurrency Fund fuera un 'fonde de inversión extranjera' o una figura de ese tipo y no una compañía o SA. 

En archivos periodísticos de Colombia, lo nombran como "fondo extranjero". El 30 de diciembre de 2009 el periódico El Tiempo publicó esto: http://www.eltiempo.com/archivo/documento-2013/CMS-6862649. 

Sin embargo, en Colombia no aparece ninguna sociedad con el nombre de tu consulta. Sí aparecen similares como EBISU SAS EMPRESA DE SERVICIOS Y SUMINISTROS, EBISU SA y EBISU LTDA y otros así.

Tampoco en otros países de la región. En Panamá hay compañías con los nombres EBISU FINANCIAL SERVICES S.A, Ebisu Marina SA, Ebisu Trader Coorp. y otras similares. 

Tal vez podrías contactar a algún periodista de El Tiempo o la revista Portafolio para consultarles, es lo único que aparece en la búsqueda: notas de ambos sobre la venta mencionada arriba. Tengo la sospecha de que se trata de un fondo en algún banco o institución financiera, pero no podría confirmarlo. En ese caso los datos no serían públicos. Seguramente los colegas que publicaron conocerán igual un poco más.

Si te acercas un poco más y defines mejor, nos avisas así seguimos con el rastreo. 

Quedamos pendientes, mientras te dejo saludos,

Sol

It looks like your best bet is digging through the local registry.

Wish I could have helped more.

Lejla

Avel Ltd iz Grčke koji sam ja našla je u vlasništvu Panagisa Voutsinasa. Nisam uspjela naći vezu između Petre i Avela.

Pretražila sam i grčki službeni glasnik, ali nisam našla da Avel ima podružnice ikako. To bi trebalo biti objavljeno tamo.

Sad za sad zatvaram zahtjev, pa ako budeš imala nova uputstva za mene, samo ponovo otvori ovaj isti zahtjev i možemo nastaviti ;)

Lejla

comment:
Dear Lajos,

Investigative Dashboard is a tool intended to help journalists primarily in developing countries to do their investigations and we do not do research or provide records for commercial companies for free.

However, we do have terms and conditions for the companies which would be willing to cover the cost of our research provided that you share with us a little more information about your company and the purpose of your request and research.

The conditions are the following:

Orbis and Lexis-Nexis Check (100 USD per request)
Company records (cover cost) 
Fee (200 USD)
Additional research (50 USD per hour)
OCCRP reserves the right to use research for future investigations. All records are made available to public 3 months after research (no extension). Will provide basic records if requested by another media in the meantime.

Let me know if you need any more information.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic
Researcher

comment:
La pregunta es para especificar:  ¿Aguas San Pedro SA sería parte del consorcio Grupo Terra? ¿Tu consulta es sobre el Grupo Terra asentado en Italia? Necesitamos precisar porque hay un 'Grupo Terra Investment Inc' en Panamá (ver ficha de alta: https://docs.google.com/a/connectas.org/file/d/0B4hV8vvDnm2NMzFiUjI1c3RqcDg/edit), Grupo Terra Nova Inc en California, USA (https://businessfilings.sos.ca.gov/frmDetail.asp?CorpID=03327554), uno en República Dominicana y tres más con ese similar. Podemos rastrear la información que necesites con esos datos, no dudes en avisarnos. 


Aquí más información sobre Aguas San Pedro SA y otras empresas del rubro, en relación a la otra consulta: 

1) Agua no facturada desde 1999 a 2010 por empresa (tiene hojas de producción y facturación por cliente, entre otros, y un porcentaje de la no facturada): https://docs.google.com/a/connectas.org/file/d/0B4hV8vvDnm2NSDFScEU1OHFxdDg/edit

2) Distribución y alcantillado por empresa desde 1996 a 2010: https://docs.google.com/a/connectas.org/file/d/0B4hV8vvDnm2NOGo3UXozSThQTFU/edit


3) Solicitudes licitaciones en trámite. A mayo, Aguas San Pedro tiene tres: Parque Industrial, Coronel, Sector Las Mariposas de Chillán, loteos Doña Rosa, Doña Victoria y Peñafiel, Chillán, Loteo Alto Jahuel, Buin: https://docs.google.com/a/connectas.org/file/d/0B4hV8vvDnm2NRExHY2lmWTlZX1U/edit


Informe: Diagnóstico institucional y estrategia de concertación y fortalecimiento del sector agua potable y saneamiento en honduras. Financiado por la Unión Europea, el diagnóstico institucional del sector agua potable, saneamiento y calidad en Honduras pretende además de estructurar un estadod de situación del servicio en Honduras, elaborar algunos mecanismos de fortalecimiento- proponiendo así mismo una estrategia de consolidación de los mecanismos de coordinación: https://docs.google.com/a/connectas.org/file/d/0B4hV8vvDnm2NN0VFX1A4VTBNVTg/edit

comment:
Dear Samuel,
Thaks for your response. 
The directors and shareholders of Asperbras Bahia Ltda are sisters José Roberto and Francisco Conalghi (sons of the founder). Asperbras Bahia Ltda was incorporated in 2013 to another company (certificate of 'Cadasttro Nacional' of Brazil attached) in Sao Pablo. I attached too the records of the Sao Pablo registry.
José Roberto and Francisco Conalghi  are the directors and shareholders of ASPERBRAS NORDESTE IRRIGACAO LTDA too. CPF/CNPJ: 02.271.201/0001-59. Record attached. 
Brazilian media defined Conalghi as a 'friend' to former president Lula and Dilma Rousseff. And said that he received credits to expand their business in other countries:: http://congressoemfoco.uol.com.br/noticias/dono-de-jatinho-recebeu-r-19-milhoes-do-banco-do-brasil/
Let me know if you need any more help,
Best,

comment:
Ćao Ermine,

evo ovako. Dokumenti u prilogu su iz službenog glasnika Luksemburga. Kad otvoriš dokument, sa lijeve strane imaš linkove sa imenima firmi, pa nađi svoju (ne mogu se izdvajati stranice).

Trenutni vlasnik je firma Lunik Invest Corp. sa BVI.
Direktori od osnivanja i do sada su: Timur Sardarov i Rashid Sardarov.
Osim njih, trenutno su direktori i Vincent Ciletti i Jean Francois Cordemans.

Prethodni vlasnici bile su dvije firme koje se samo drže dionice, tj. holding companies ili incorporation agents.

U ovom Orbis pregledu su nabrojane sve podružnice firme, ali one se MORAJU odvojeno potvrditi. Skoro smo (na teži način) otkrili da njihova baza može pogrešno uvezati podružnice firmi :)

Javi ako još nešto bude trebalo.



Lejla

comment:
Dear Karla,

thank you very much for your requests. Your other request regarding Shanghai Jianpu will be processed as soon as possible.
However, this question is really broad and vague. We do not do reporting part of the work for journalists. We can answer a question regarding one specific company, person, issue or a document but we cannot do stories for you.

If you have any other requests of specific questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Best,

Lejla Camdzic
Researcher

comment:
Hello Roger,

Investigative Dashboard is based in Europe and is intended to help out journalists in the developing countries.
We only deal with requests for specific companies or individuals and their businesses.
We currently don't have any researches in Thailand and we don't have access to the type of information you are requesting.
Your best option would probably be to turn to one of the local media organizations and see if you can get them interested in this project.

We are very sorry we were not able to help more.

Sincerely,

Lejla Camdzic
Researcher
